organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Joe Gibbs Racing will race the Toyota Camry beginning in 2008. The move will provide Toyota with three of the sport’s top drivers in Tony Stewart, Denny Hamlin and Kyle Busch.
snippet: Joe Gibbs Racing will race the Toyota Camry beginning in 2008. The move will provide Toyota with three of the sport’s top drivers in Tony Stewart, Denny Hamlin and Kyle Busch.
